synopsis: Red Hat Ceph Storage 2.2 bug fix and enhancement update

content.topic: Red Hat Ceph Storage 2.2 is now available.
content.description:
Red Hat Ceph Storage is a scalable, open, software-defined storage platform
that combines the most stable version of the Ceph storage system with a
Ceph management platform, deployment utilities, and support services.

Bug Fixes and Enhancements:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Ceph
Storage 2.2 Release Notes available at:

https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_ceph_storage/2.2/html-single/release_notes/
content.solution:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
